text: The Independent Democratic MPs (, Anexartitoi Dimokratikoi Vouleftes) was a recognized parliamentary group of the Hellenic Parliament. This parliamentary group included independent MPs originally elected with New Democracy, the Panhellenic Socialist Movement, the Coalition of the Radical Left, the Independent Greeks and the Democratic Left parties. ==External links== * Hellenic Parliament - Anexartitoi Dimokratikoi Vouleftes Category:Hellenic Parliament Category:2013 establishments in Greece
title: Independent Democratic MPs
